forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Partly Cloudy then Areas Of Fog
forecast.detailedForecast: Areas of fog after midnight. Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 10 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
The afternoon in Downtown San Francisco unfolds with a bright and inviting ambiance, the kind that draws both locals and visitors alike to the vibrant streets. As the sun casts its golden rays, peeking through the lingering shadows of the morning fog, temperatures hover around a delightful 70 degrees, perfect for a casual stroll or a café break on a charming patio. A brisk west-southwest wind stirs, carrying with it the salty tang of the Pacific—a gentle reminder of the city’s seaside spirit.

As twilight approaches, expect the scene to shift as areas of fog gently roll in after midnight, shrouding the landscape in a soft, silvery veil. The temperatures will dip into the low 50s, so consider donning a light jacket or a cozy sweater as you venture out to embrace the evening ambiance. The fog offers a unique opportunity to explore lit streets and cozy nooks, perhaps heading to a local bistro to savor a warm dish or a fragrant cup of coffee. Tonight's cloud cover and gentle breeze will turn the skyline into a mystical tableau, perfect for quiet contemplation or casual conversation among friends.
